modal.titulo: WHAT TO DO WITHOUT THE CODE
modal.enlaceBuscamos: Let us know what you need

somos.contenido: Since 2018, DAX has specialized in providing spare parts for all types of machinery to its clients in Latin America. Initially attending to the construction sector in Bolivia, Peru, and Paraguay; Today the DAX service extends to various countries and areas. His passion for technology; It has allowed it to develop its own technology that allows its customers to purchase spare parts efficiently, economically and in one place. Allowing your customers to benefit from savings on spare parts, freight, and time.

hacemos.contenido: We offer you an easy and simple service to search, quote and buy spare parts for heavy, agricultural and construction equipment. Our system will offer you the best brands, prices and delivery times in Bolivia and the world. You decide which one to buy and we will send it to you. You don't need to call different stores to find your part, we will find it for you. All in one place.

span.a2: Excavators, tractors, bull-dozer shovel loaders, motor graders etc.

contacto.contenido: We like to meet and chat with our new clients. Start by sending us a message and we will contact you shortly.
